item.title: Npcdrop.cfg
item.dc:creator: @_devil_666 (devil)666
item.description:
@_devil_666 wrote:

i have folowed the tut to change (add) more drops.

i add the monster to the autospawn (if i havent already got) and i add a drop to it.

eg. i made all the barrows brothers spawn in varock sq and then went to the npcdrop.cfg and added

npcdrop = 2028 0 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 npcdrop = 2027 0 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 npcdrop = 2026 0 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 npcdrop = 2025 0 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 npcdrop = 2029 0 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 npcdrop = 2030 0 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000 995 100000

if some one can help please post telling me how to add drops to my npcs. ty. [br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 02:05:55 PM[/size][hr]or if you know another way of changing drops id love to know that. btw im using testscape

Read full topic
